articles.author: Richard Goldstein
articles.title: K.C. Jones, Celtics Standout as Player and Coach, Dies at 88 - The New York Times
articles.description: As a defense-minded guard, he played on eight consecutive championship teams. He later found success leading the team from the sidelines.
articles.content: K.C. Jones, the quietly tenacious Hall of Fame guard who played on eight consecutive N.B.A. championship teams with the Boston Celtics and later coached the team to two league titles, died on Friday.… [+883 chars]
